name: Ling Chen

recipes.name: Kung Pao Chicken
recipes.cookingMethod: Heat oil in a wok over high heat. Add beaten eggs and scramble until cooked. Add cooked rice, green onions, peas, and Sichuan peppercorns. Stir-fry until rice is heated through and ingredients are evenly distributed. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Mapo Tofu
recipes.cookingMethod: Heat oil in a wok over high heat. Add beaten eggs and scramble until cooked. Add cooked rice, green onions, peas, and Sichuan peppercorns. Stir-fry until rice is heated through and ingredients are evenly distributed. Serve hot.

bio: Chef Ling Chen is a master of Sichuan cuisine, known for her bold use of Sichuan peppercorns and fiery dried chilies. With over 20 years of experience in the kitchen, she has honed her craft and developed a loyal following. She is passionate about introducing the world to the flavors of Sichuan and is always experimenting with new recipes.

name: Wang Xiaohua

bio: Chef Wang Xiaohua is a master of Huaiyang cuisine, known for his delicate balance of sweet and salty flavors. With over 25 years of experience in the kitchen, he has won numerous awards and accolades for his dishes. He is passionate about preserving the traditions of Huaiyang cuisine while also incorporating modern techniques.

name: Li Ming

recipes.name: Stir-Fried Vegetables
recipes.cookingMethod: Heat oil in a wok over high heat. Add garlic and stir-fry until fragrant. Add vegetables and continue to stir-fry until crisp-tender. Add soy sauce and stir to combine. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Sichuan Fried Rice
recipes.cookingMethod: Heat oil in a wok over high heat. Add beaten eggs and scramble until cooked. Add cooked rice, green onions, peas, and Sichuan peppercorns. Stir-fry until rice is heated through and ingredients are evenly distributed. Serve hot.

bio: Chef Li Ming is a rising star in the Chinese culinary world, known for her innovative twists on traditional dishes. With 15 years of experience in the kitchen, she has a deep understanding of Chinese flavors and techniques. She is passionate about using fresh, locally-sourced ingredients to create healthy and delicious dishes for her customers.

name: Li Wei

recipes.name: Spicy Shrimp
recipes.cookingMethod:
1. Heat a wok over high heat and add vegetable oil. Stir-fry the garlic, ginger, and dried red chilies until fragrant. 
2. Add the shrimp and stir-fry until they are pink and cooked through. 
3. Add Sichuan peppercorns and stir-fry for another minute. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Cumin Lamb
recipes.cookingMethod:
1. Cut the lamb shoulder into bite-sized pieces. Marinate with cumin, garlic, and ginger for 30 minutes. 
2. Heat a wok over high heat and add vegetable oil. Stir-fry the lamb until browned. 
3. Add green onions and stir-fry for another minute. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Stir-fried Bok Choy
recipes.cookingMethod:
1. Wash the bok choy and cut into bite-sized pieces. 
2. Heat a wok over high heat and add vegetable oil. Stir-fry the garlic and ginger until fragrant. 
3. Add the bok choy and stir-fry until wilted. 
4. Add soy sauce and oyster sauce and stir-fry for another minute. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Sichuan Dry Fried Green Beans
recipes.cookingMethod: Heat oil in a wok over high heat. Add beaten eggs and scramble until cooked. Add cooked rice, green onions, peas, and Sichuan peppercorns. Stir-fry until rice is heated through and ingredients are evenly distributed. Serve hot.

bio: Chef Li Wei specializes in Sichuan-style seafood and lamb dishes. With 15 years of experience in the kitchen, he has developed a keen sense of taste and a deep knowledge of Chinese culinary traditions. He loves to experiment with new flavors and ingredients while staying true to the authentic flavors of his hometown.

name: Li Fui
bio: Chef Li Wei fui is a specialist in Sichuan cuisine, particularly famous for his mastery of ma la dishes. With over 15 years of experience, he is known for his bold use of Sichuan peppercorns and fiery dried chilies. He is passionate about sharing his love for Sichuan cuisine and introducing people to the diverse flavors of his homeland.
